name: Project GIG
description:
This is a single level FPS clone/parody of Project IGI. The game has similar features and stays faithful to the original game's stories and characters which will bring childhood nostalgia and pure enjoyment.

Game comes with choice of two weapons, Sniper and Assault Rife. The AI does not move from its place but will shoot you if you stay in his sights, :p. You can also drive a Truck to find hidden ways to attack the base. Interactable doors & ladders can also be used for your advantage.

After Emptying the base you have to do platforming to reach the end of the train.

It uses free assets, especially easyFPS and other assets from unity asset store. 

System Requirements 

Pentium III, 256MB RAM, Voodoo GFX 64 MB or greater

Microsoft Windows 98, 2000 & XP.

The above requirements is joke, any modern PC should play the game.
